alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:16PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 800 PM MST... At 716 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valencia West, or 13 miles west of Tucson, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects and create areas of blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Drexel Heights, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Valencia West, Tucson Estates and Ryan AirField. This includes the following highways... Route 86 between mile markers 145 and 165. Route 286 between mile markers 39 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
